_sText:
My first bhop map, bhop_arcane. This is a very long bhop map which goes through multiple themes. Overall there are 5 stages with secrets. There is also multihopping on this map so players can bhop on the same platform multiple times. Good luck!

Features:
 - 5 long stages
 - 5 secret buttons (1 per stage) which unlock bonus content at the end of the map
 - Pistols with trails at the end of each stage
 - Hidden weapons throughout the map
 - High speed bhop raceways (grassy underground area, neon area, and snow area)
 - Waterfall slides (sewer area)
 - Long multihop platforms with obstacles (neon area)
 - Launchers (snow area)
 - At the end of the map:
 --- Scouts
 --- Long jumps
 --- 9 weapons (3 must be unlocked with secret buttons)
 --- Bonus with special weapon at the end (bonus must be unlocked with secret buttons)

If you were a beta tester and want to be added to the list, ask me on steam.
